title: Airbnb's package for India's economy has Rs 7,200 cr, 85,000 jobs
description: A report by Oxford Economics reveals that Airbnb has contributed over Rs 7,200 crore to India's GDP and supported 85,000 jobs in 2022. Despite the challenges posed by the Covid-19 pandemic, Airbnb has played a significant role in boosting India's tourism industry. The report also highlights the positive impact of Airbnb guest spending on local communities, with guests spending over Rs 6,400 crore in areas like transportation, restaurants, and retail stores. The presence of Airbnb was highest in Goa, followed by Bangalore, Delhi, Mumbai, and Manali.
